    • Constructor Detail

      • Component

        public Component(int columnIndex,
                 int rowIndex,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Constructs a new AsciiComponent.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The x-axis (column) coordinate of the top-left character.
        rowIndex - The y-axis (row) coordinate of the top-left character.
        width - The width, in characters.
        height - The height, in characters.

        Registers events, required by the component, with the specified panel.

        Throws:

        Draws the component on the specified screen.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • transmitDraw

        public void transmitDraw()
        Attempts to transmit a "DRAW" event to the assigned Radio.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Component otherComponent)
        Determines if the specified component intersects with this component.
        Parameters:
        otherComponent - The component to check intersection with.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the components intersect.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the other component is null.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(int pointX,
                          int pointY)
        Determines if the specified point intersects with this component.
        Parameters:
        pointX - The x-axis (column) coordinate.
        pointY - The y-axis (row) coordinate.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the point intersects with this component.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(MouseEvent event,
                          int fontWidth,
                          int fontHeight)
        Determines whether or not the specified mouse event is at a point that intersects this component.
        Parameters:
        event - The event.
        fontWidth - The width of the font being used to draw the component's characters.
        fontHeight - The height of the font being used to draw the component's characters.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the mouse event is at a point that intersects this component.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the event is null.

      • isPositionValid

        public boolean isPositionValid(int columnIndex,
                               int rowIndex)
        Determines whether or not the specified position is within the bounds of the component.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The x-axis (column) coordinate.
        rowIndex - The y-axis (row) coordinate.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the specified position is within the bounds of the component.

      • enableBlinkEffect

        public void enableBlinkEffect(short millsBetweenBlinks,
                              com.valkryst.VRadio.Radio<String> radio)
        Enables the blink effect for every character.
        Parameters:
        millsBetweenBlinks - The amount of time, in milliseconds, before the blink effect can occur.
        radio - The Radio to transmit a DRAW event to whenever a blink occurs.

      • resumeBlinkEffect

        public void resumeBlinkEffect()
        Resumes the blink effect for every character.

      • pauseBlinkEffect

        public void pauseBlinkEffect()
        Pauses the blink effect for every character.

      • disableBlinkEffect

        public void disableBlinkEffect()
        Disables the blink effect for every character.

        Sets all characters to be redrawn.

      • getCharacterAt

        public Optional<AsciiCharacter> getCharacterAt(int columnIndex,
                                               int rowIndex)
        Retrieves the AsciiCharacter at a specific location.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The x-axis (column) coordinate of the location.
        rowIndex - The y-axis (row) coordinate of the location.
        Returns:
        The AsciiCharacter at the specified location or nothing if the location is invalid.

      • setColumnIndex

        public void setColumnIndex(int columnIndex)
        Sets a new value for the columnIndex. Does nothing if the specified columnIndex is < 0.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The new x-axis (column) coordinate of the top-left character of the component.

      • setRowIndex

        public void setRowIndex(int rowIndex)
        Sets a new value for the rowIndex. Does nothing if the specified rowIndex is < 0.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The y-axis (row) coordinate of the top-left character of the component.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Sets a new value for the width. Does nothing if the specified width is < 0 or < columnIndex.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width, in characters, of the component.

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(int height)
        Sets a new value for the height. Does nothing if the specified height is < 0 or < rowIndex.
        Parameters:
        height - The new height, in characters, of the component.

      • setRadio

        public void setRadio(com.valkryst.VRadio.Radio<String> radio)
        Sets a new radio.
        Parameters:
        radio - The new radio.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the radio is null.
